npm install -g livescript

`cat run.ls`
```livescript
x = 10
do ->
    x = 5
```

`lsc -bcp run.ls`
```javascript
// Generated by LiveScript 1.4.0
var x;
x = 10;
(function(){
  var x;
  return x = 5;
})();
```

`lsc --no-header -bcp run.ls`

```javascript
var x;
x = 10;
(function(){
  var x;
  return x = 5;
})();
```

```livescript
# Easy listing of implicit objects #列出隱含物件
table1 =
  * id: 1
    name: 'george'
  * id: 2
    name: 'mike'
  * id: 3
    name: 'donald'
``
